discord.py-message-components support for all the beautifully interactions by discord.

  • ApplicationCommand
  • SlashCommand
  • SubCommand
  • SlashCommandOption
  • SlashCommandOptionChoice

  • MessageCommand
  • ActionRow
  • Button
  • SelectMenu
  • SelectOption
  • Modal
  • TextInput
  • BaseInteraction
  • ApplicationCommandInteraction
  • ComponentInteraction
  • AutocompleteInteraction
  • ModalSubmitInteraction
  • Localizations
